actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a flood control project for the Miami River at Fairfield, Ohio.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to: (1) construct a flood control project on the Pleasant Run tributary of the Miami River at Fairfield, Ohio; and (2) consider certain drainage improvements and channel work as part of the non-Federal project contribution.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a flood control project for the Miami River at Fairfield, Ohio.
